about_the_game:
No-Hi is a parkour platformer where you can combo your moves to gain speed and carve your path with momentum!

  • > Explore the map your way without ever getting lost.
  • > Face unique bosses with graceful movements.
  • > Synergize items to create your own gameplay style.

Take control of this semi-god who has lost its power and be challenged!

Combo jumps, dashes, shots, dives, uppercuts, and more! Perform them in any order you like, gain velocity, and finish the game fast. Or calculate your moves with precision.

Run in any direction! No more worries about where you're going! The map adapts to your movement and takes you where you need to be!

Bosses with beautiful moves, combined with insane attack sequences! Are you able to defeat these personalities from No-Hi?

Adapt the game to your style. Prefer a slower pace? No problem. Want to dive upwards instead of down? You can! Use the items to make the game suit you! Create amazing combinations and maybe even break the game!

Challenge Yourself! Download no-hi now!
